Sun, 16 Feb 2025 17:00:00 +0000 Auckland resident Bernadette Rawiri (left) has been sentenced for participating in the 24-day kidnapping of Kayla Pawa (right), who was repeatedly tortured in an attempt to get her partner's cryptocurrency password.
